name: Quantum Colors
description:
Quantum Colors is a new arcade game. Your goal is to drag and classify the particles before they explode. You will find several power-ups to help you, but you have to be fast.

How many points will you be able to achieve?

- Easy to play.
- Increasing difficulty.
- Combos.
- Several power-ups to help you.
- 2 to 5 minutes matches: Enjoy a fast match!
- Leaderboard.

Enjoy!
